/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, looking towards the horizon. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. On either side of the road, lush green trees and bushes line the street, their leaves rustling in the breeze. Power lines stretch across the sky, following the path of the road. In the distance, majestic mountains rise against the sky, adding a sense of depth and grandeur to the landscape. The image is captured from a low angle, making the viewer feel as if they are part of the scene, driving down the road towards the horizon. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and bushes contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The image is a beautiful representation of a sunny day in Beijing, capturing the city's natural beauty and architectural charm.
